Verses: 1 idho, Ratchikkakkoodaadhapadikkuk Karththarudaiya Kai Kurugippogavumillai; Ketkakkoodaadhapadikku Avarudaiya Sevi Mandhamaagavumillai.
2 ungal Akkiramangale Ungalukkum Ungal Dhevanukkum Naduvaagap Pirivinai Undaakkugiradhu; Ungal Paavangale Avar Ungalukku Sevikodaadhapadikku Avarudaiya Mugaththai Ungalukku Maraikkiradhu.
3 enendraal, Ungal Kaigal Raththaththaalum, Ungal Viralgal Akkiramaththaalum, Karaippattirukkiradhu, Ungal Udhadugal Poiyaip Pesi, Ungal Naavu Nyaayakkettai Vasanikkiradhu.
4 needhiyaith Thedugiravanumillai, Saththiyaththinpadi Vazhakkaadugiravanumillai; Maayaiyai Nambi, Abaththamaanadhaip Pesugiraargal; Theemaiyaik Karppandhariththu, Akkiramaththaip Perugiraargal.
5 kattuviriyanin Muttaigalai Adaikaaththu, Silandhiyin Nesavugalai Neygiraargal; Avaigalin Muttaigalai Saappidugiravan Saavaan; Avaigal Nerukkappattadheyaanaal Viriyan Purappadum.
6 avaigalin Nesavugal Vasthirangalukketravaigal Alla; Thangal Kiriyaigalaale Thangalai Moodikkollamaattaargal; Avargal Kiriyaigal Akkiramakkiriyaigal; Kodumaiyaana Seygai Avargal Kaigalilirukkiradhu.
7 avargal Kaalgal Pollaappu Seyya Odi, Kutramillaadha Raththaththai Sindhath Theevirikkiradhu, Avargal Ninaivugal Akkiramaninaivugal; Paazhkkadippum Azhivum Avargal Vazhigalilirukkiradhu.
8 samaadhaana Vazhiyai Ariyaargal; Avargal Nadaigalil Nyaayamillai; Thangal Paadhaigalaith Thaangale Konalaakkikkondaargal; Avaigalil Nadakkira Oruvanum Samaadhaanaththai Ariyaan.

9 aadhalaal, Nyaayam Engalukku Dhooramaayirukkiradhu, Needhi Engalaith Thodarndhu Pidikkaadhu; Velichchaththukkuk Kaaththirundhom, Idho, Irul; Pragaasaththukkuk Kaaththirundhom, Aanaalum Andhagaaraththile Nadakkirom.
10 naangal Kurudaraippol Suvaraip Pidiththu, Kannillaadhavargalaippol Thadavugirom; Iravil Idarugiradhupolap Pattappagalilum Idarugirom; Seththavargalaippol Paazhidangalil Irukkirom.
11 naangal Anaivarum Karadigalaippola Urumi, Puraakkalaippolak Koovikkondirukkirom, Nyaayaththukkuk Kaaththirundhom, Adhaikkaanom; Ratchippukkuk Kaaththirundhom, Adhu Engalukku Dhooramaayitru.
12 engal Meerudhalgal Umakku Munbaaga Migudhiyaayirundhu, Engal Paavangal Engalukku Virodhamaai Saatchisollugiradhu, Engal Meerudhalgal Engalode Irukkiradhu; Engal Akkiramangalai Arindhirukkirom.

13 karththarukku Virodhamaai Dhrogampanni, Poipesi, Engal Dhevanaivittup Pinvaanginom; Kodumaiyaagavum Kalagamaagavum Pesinom; Kallavaarththaigalaik Karppandhariththu, Irudhayaththilirundhu Pirappikkappanninom.
14 nyaayam Pinnittu Agandradhu; Needhi Dhooramaai Nindradhu; Saththiyam Veedhiyile Idari, Yadhaarththam Vandhu Seramaattaamarpogiradhu.
15 saththiyam Thallupadiyaayitru; Pollaappai Vittu Vilagugiravan Kollaiyaagiraan; Idhaik Karththar Paarththu Nyaayamillaiyendru Visanamullavaraanaar.
16 oruvarum Illaiyendru Kandu, Vinnappam Pannugiravan Illaiyendru Aachchariyappattaar; Aadhalaal Avarudaiya Buyame Avarukku Ratchippaagi, Avarudaiya Needhiye Avaraith Thaangugiradhu.

17 avar Needhiyai Maarkkavasamaaga Anindhu, Ratchippennum Seeraavaith Thamadhu Sirasil Thariththu, Needhisarikkattudhalennum Vasthirangalai Uduppaaga Uduththu, Vairaakkiyaththai Saalvaiyaagap Porththukkondaar.
18 kiriyaigalukkuththakka Palanai Alippaar, Thammudaiya Saththurukkalidaththil Ukkiraththai Sarikkatti, Thammudaiya Pagaignarukkuth Thakka Palanaiyum, Theevugalukkuththakka Palanaiyum Sarikkattuvaar.

19 appozhudhu Sooriyan Asthamikkunthisaithodangi Karththarin Naamaththukkum, Sooriyan Udhikkunthisaithodangi Avarudaiya Magimaikkum Bayappaduvaargal; Vellampol Saththuru Varumpodhu, Karththarudaiya Aaviyaanavar Avanukku Virodhamaaik Kodiyetruvaar.
20 meetpar Seeyonukkum, Yaakkobile Meerudhalaivittuth Thirumbugiravargalukkum, Varuvaar Endru Karththar Sollugiraar.

21 unmelirukkira En Aaviyum, Naan Un Vaayil Aruliya En Vaarththaigalum, Idhumudhal Endrendraikkum Un Vaayilirundhum, Un Sandhadhiyin Vaayilirundhum, Un Sandhadhiyinudaiya Sandhadhiyin Vaayilirundhum Neenguvadhillaiyendru Karththar Sollugiraar; Idhu Enakku Avargalodirukkum En Udanpadikkaiyendru Karththar Sollugiraar.
